entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 4.

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 15. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 40 percent chance of showers late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
